description: Create a project transport plan event time.
permissions: Allowed if the user can update the related project transport plan event via ProjectTransportPlanEventPolicy, or if the user is a member in the broker branch and is an active driver assigned to a segment connected to the event's stop.
side_effects: Creates a project transport plan event time; for expected or actual times, sets manual override state (is_manual_override true, is_app_owned false) when time values are set/changed. After create/update, may close the tractor actualization window and may publish a transport order stop arrival event.
validation_notes: --project-transport-plan-event and --kind are required. Either --start-at or --at is required; --at sets start_at and end_at to the same value. kind must be one of: planned, expected, actual, modeled. start_at is required by the server. end_at must be greater than or equal to start_at when provided. kind must be unique per project transport plan event. For actual times, start_at/end_at cannot be earlier than actual times on earlier plan events with overlapping equipment.

flags.name: --at
flags.description: Legacy timestamp; sets start and end to the same value
